use_cases.title: User Search and Product Filtering
use_cases.description: The user searches for products and filters the results based on various criteria.
use_cases.preconditions: The user is logged in and has access to the search functionality.

main_flow.step: The user enters a search query in the search bar.
main_flow.description: The user types a search query in the search bar.

main_flow.step: The system retrieves a list of search results.
main_flow.description: The system searches for products based on the user's search query.

main_flow.step: The user filters the search results.
main_flow.description: The user selects filters to narrow down the search results.

main_flow.step: The system displays the filtered search results.
main_flow.description: The system displays the filtered search results to the user.

use_cases.postconditions: The user has viewed the filtered search results.
use_cases.business_value: The user can quickly find products that match their search criteria.

use_cases.title: Product Details and Reviews
use_cases.description: The user views product details and reviews from other users.
use_cases.preconditions: The user has selected a product from the search results.

main_flow.step: The user selects a product to view its details.
main_flow.description: The user clicks on a product to view its details.

main_flow.step: The system displays product details.
main_flow.description: The system displays the product's details, including price, description, and images.

main_flow.step: The user views reviews from other users.
main_flow.description: The user clicks on a review to view its content.

main_flow.step: The system displays the reviews.
main_flow.description: The system displays the reviews to the user.

use_cases.postconditions: The user has viewed the product details and reviews.
use_cases.business_value: The user can make informed purchasing decisions.

use_cases.title: Cart Management
use_cases.description: The user adds and manages products in their cart.
use_cases.preconditions: The user has selected products to add to their cart.

main_flow.step: The user adds a product to their cart.
main_flow.description: The user clicks the 'Add to Cart' button.

main_flow.step: The system updates the cart contents.
main_flow.description: The system updates the cart contents to reflect the added product.

main_flow.step: The user removes a product from their cart.
main_flow.description: The user clicks the 'Remove' button.

main_flow.step: The system updates the cart contents.
main_flow.description: The system updates the cart contents to reflect the removed product.

use_cases.postconditions: The user has managed their cart contents.
use_cases.business_value: The user can easily manage their cart contents.

use_cases.title: Checkout and Payment
use_cases.description: The user completes the checkout process and pays for their products.
use_cases.preconditions: The user has added products to their cart and has access to payment options.

main_flow.step: The user proceeds to checkout.
main_flow.description: The user clicks the 'Checkout' button.

main_flow.step: The system displays payment options.
main_flow.description: The system displays payment options to the user.

main_flow.step: The user selects a payment option.
main_flow.description: The user clicks on a payment option.

main_flow.step: The system processes the payment.
main_flow.description: The system processes the payment and updates the order status.

use_cases.postconditions: The user has completed the checkout process and paid for their products.
use_cases.business_value: The user can complete the checkout process and receive their products.

use_cases.title: Order Tracking and Management
use_cases.description: The user tracks and manages their orders.
use_cases.preconditions: The user has placed an order.

main_flow.step: The user views their order history.
main_flow.description: The user clicks on the 'Order History' button.

main_flow.step: The system displays order details.
main_flow.description: The system displays the order details, including status and shipping information.

main_flow.step: The user tracks the order status.
main_flow.description: The user clicks on the 'Track Order' button.

main_flow.step: The system displays the order status.
main_flow.description: The system displays the order status to the user.

use_cases.postconditions: The user has tracked and managed their orders.
use_cases.business_value: The user can easily track and manage their orders.

business_requirements.overview: The E-Commerce Platform - ShopEasy is designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly shopping experience.
business_goals: To provide a user-friendly and intuitive interface for users to browse and purchase products.
To enable users to easily manage their carts and checkout process.
To provide a secure and reliable payment processing system.
success_criteria: Users can easily find and purchase products.
Users can manage their carts and checkout process efficiently.
Users can track and manage their orders effectively.
constraints: The system must be able to handle a high volume of users and transactions.
The system must be secure and reliable to protect user data and payment information.
assumptions: Users will have access to a stable internet connection and a compatible device.
risks: Technical issues may arise during the checkout process or payment processing.
Users may not be able to find products or navigate the system effectively.
mitigation_strategies: Implement a robust testing and quality assurance process to identify and fix technical issues.
Provide user-friendly and intuitive interface design to reduce navigation difficulties.
